this_title: ONE OK ROCK 2023 "LUXURY DISEASE" JAPAN TOUR
introduction: ONE OK ROCK has announced a global livestream on June 3rd (Sat) of the performance at Tokyo Dome from the tour “ONE OK ROCK 2023 LUXURY DISEASE JAPAN TOUR” which consisted of performing at 6 of the major Dome venues in Japan.With the success of the tour ending perfectly at Sapporo Dome, don’t miss out on the chance to experience the performance with tickets for the global livestream going on sale today.【Live Viewing Date and Time】ONE OK ROCK 2023 LUXURY DISEASE JAPAN TOURJune 3rd, 2023 (Sat)7:00 PM (JST) / 6:00 AM (EDT) / 3:00 AM (PDT) / 11:00 AM (BST)※Re-watch is available from start of stream until June 4th (Sun)11:59 PM (JST) / 10:59 AM (EDT) / 7:59 AM (PDT) / 3:59 PM (BST)Details and ticket link: ONE OK ROCK Official Live Streaming SiteURL:https://liveship.tokyo/en/oneokrock2023JapanTour/
chinese_title: ONE OK ROCK 2023 "LUXURY DISEASE" JAPAN TOUR
